title: What are some things that never get better? - Quora

response.answer_text: Rather than being skeptical, let us ensure to utilize each and every element of our energy in ensuring that we are becoming ever more better in ever far more commendable ways. Meaning that instead of divesting away our precious time frames in scrutinizing and shortcomings of others like an inspector-let us instead sharpen out wits to ever more intelligently supervise and sustain an ever more definable code of conduct that is meritoriously helping us achieve and grow ever more eminently. For ultimately-at any given instance, the level of satisfaction derived from something well done over shadows any of that sarcastic mindset that is only focused on belittling and getting entangled all the over more in other’s shortcomings….
